physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: Afebrile; Heart rate, Blood pressure, Respiratory rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tonsils slightly enlarged, nasal mucosa normal, tympanic membranes not inflamed with tympanostomy tube present on right ear, normal conjunctivae, supple neck without adenopathy or thyromegaly, normal lung and cardiovascular exams, normal abdominal exam, no splenomegaly, joints with full range of motion without inflammation, and no skin rash. CBC and differential, IgA, IgG, IgM, IgE, complement proteins C3, C4, CH50, C-reactive protein, and erythrocyte sedimentation rate normal. IgD level 3 mg/dl (normal range: 0-14).

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 38.8 Â°C (1 h after ibuprofen); Heart rate, Blood pressure, Respiratory rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Child was alert and pleasant. Tonsils erythematous and enlarged without exudate. No cervical adenopathy, no oral ulceration, and no other changes from previous examination. Throat swab for Group A Streptococcus negative. Normal urinalysis and urine culture. CBC and differential within normal limits; absolute neutrophil count increased; erythrocyte sedimentation rate elevated at 50 mm/h; C-reactive protein elevated at 21.9 mg/dl.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Tonsils enlarged and erythematous since previous examination, with elevated inflammatory markers. Other findings consistent with previous examination.
